column5: hey guys quick question...are they on zone 20 or 16?  wasn't quite sure where they afll under.was lookin to go after pike but am not sure. thanks for any info in advance guys
You sure about that... since Toronto Harbour is only mentioned in the Zone 20 exemptions for using two lines??

...I guess it depends on where your line is being thrown... if towards the actual LAKE of LAKE ONTARIO... then Z20... but if your on "land" but fishing a body of water connected to L. Ontario... then I think Z16? Now you have me double-thinking this....
i thought it ouht to be in zone 20 , then i could be wrong that's why i haven't gone out for pike yet.
just checked it 20. so 1st sat in may till i go after the pike  toronto harbour was mentioned in the exeptions so i guess it's part of it.
